p: 7. The ultimate goal: not philosophical anthropology but what makes being intelligible. The ultimate goal of this preparatory analysis is to work out the question of what accounts for being. SZ I.1 will not provide a complete regional ontology of ex-sistence—something that would be necessary if we wanted to construct an adequate philosophical anthropology or to provide the ontological foundations for that. At best our analysis will provide some elements for such an anthropology, and important ones at that.
